content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_playlist
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO staging.playlist
(songId 1, playlist 2, trackName 3, artist 4, albumName 5, popularity 6)
FROM 'https://dataengineerproject.dfs.core.windows.net/dataengineerproject/tracks_csv.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2 -- skip header row
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://dataengineerproject.dfs.core.windows.net/dataengineerproject/'
)
--END
GO
